Class User

Object
User
public class User extends Object
Represents a user objects who uses the system
Author:
Qiang ZhiQin

    • User

      public User(String name, String userID, Faculty faculty, Role role)
      Creates a new user object based on the given parameters
      Parameters:
      name - this is the name of the user
      userID - this is the user ID
      faculty - this is the faculty that the user belongs to
      role - this is the role of the user

    • User

      public User(String name, String userID, String password, Faculty faculty, Role role, Date lastLogin)
      Creates a new user object based on the given parameters
      Parameters:
      name - this is the name of the user
      userID - this is the user ID
      password - this is the password of the user
      faculty - this is the faculty that the user belongs to
      role - this is the role of the user
      lastLogin - this is the date that the user last logged-in
